mapper.select: select d.deal_id as dealId, d.house_id as houseId, d.area as area, d.floor as floor, d.deal_type as dealType, d.deposit as deposit, d.price as price, d.like as like, i.house_name as "houseInfo.houseName", i.house_type as "houseInfo.houseType", i.build_year as "houseInfo.buildYear", i.jibun as "houseInfo.jibun", i.lat as "houseInfo.lat", i.lng as "houseInfo.lng", i.img as "houseInfo.img" from housedeal d, houseinfo i where d.house_id = i.house_id and i.dong_code = #{dongCode}
